content: It seems like there needs to be a lot of back and forth between me and Claude DC with getting things on my actual machine outside of his virtual environment. I fully understand that is a hard constraint, that Claude DC can't access my physical machine, but I really don't want to be in the loop for just like moving stuff if it all possible. Are there any technologies or things that we can automate that can enable us to bridge the gap between the two environments without my intervention?
